welcome: Welcome to the Training Checker Telegram bot!
help:
Available commands:
/playerinfo [nickname] - Get player information
/online - Get list of online players
/worlds - Get world list
/copchase - Get copchase lobbies
/admins - Get admin list
/badges - Get badge information
/language - Change language
player_info_cyrillic_not_allowed: Cyrillic characters are not allowed in nicknames.
